到達目標: 学生がもっと流暢に話すと短いプレゼンテーションをできるようになる。
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
The text will be followed quite closely. There will be ample opportunity for pair work.
対⾯授業の同時双⽅向でのオンライン配信（Zoom 等での配信）。

第4回: Submit assignment topic. Text, unit 2, p.25; unit 3, pp. 29-31.
第7回: Midterm (listening) exam. Text, unit 3, pp. 38; unit 4, pp. 39-40.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are required to prepare for class and (when appropriate) review. Students are also required to bring the textbook, a pen or pencil, paper and a dictionary to class.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: The student's grade will be based on quizzes, writing assignments and oral presentation. No final exam will be given during exam period. Those students who miss five classes or more during the term will receive 0 points for the course.
評価.成績評価Grading2:
備考　Note
Class participation 30% Midterm (listening) exam 30% Final presentation 40% Total 100%
